name: Blueprint Builder
description:
Controls

  • A/D or [left/right] to move
  • [space] to jump
  • W or [up] to pick up or set down crates
  • S or [down] to activate/deactivate blueprint
  • R to restart level
  • M to toggle music

Music

  • Game music | LittleRobotSoundFactory | CC Attribution

Software

  • Created with Haxe, Heaps.io, deepnightLibs, and GIMP.
